page.title: 12Places of Worship.
page.content: {SNAILBEACH METHODIST CHAPEL,}was built in{1876}and is very large. The weekly services are held at 2:45 pm and 6 pm each Sunday. Sunday School is at 11 am on Sundays. Harvest Festivals are held at the end of September.The Minister is the Rev. Raymond Smith. {LORDSHILL BAPTIST CHAPEL}Baptism is by full submersion in the water.Lords Hill is a small Chapel on the hill above Snailbeach.Some chapels are registered for weddings, but here the Minister can only perform a marriage with a Registrar present. There are 2 services on Sundays at 10:15 and 6:00. {PERKINS BEACH METHODIST CHAPEL}is a small Chapel in Perkins Beach Dingle. Some of their activities are Sunday services morning & afternoon, Sunday School anniversary, camp meetings, chapel anniversary and the usual Christian festival services.
